name: Matroshka
description:
A crossbreed between bullet hell and platformer, where your only weapon is your protective shield, which reflects enemy projects back to their owner.

Controls

All native Windows compatible controllers are supported and are recommend for the best experience. 

M&K controls are still experimental, but workable:

A,D - Walk 

S - Descend platform

Spacebar - Jump

Left mouse - Progress dialogue

Right mouse + Mouse Direction - Shield/Block 

ESC - Pause
